item.title: I’m Something of a Painter Myself
item.description: Developed a GAN that generates 7,000 to 10,000 Monet-style images.

item.title: AI for Blind
item.description: Developed a classification model for predicting seven emotions like (angry, disgusted,fearful, happy, neutral, sad and surprised) using FER-2013 dataset.

item.title: Google Landmark Recognition 2020
item.description: Developed a classification model for predicting landmark labels using the GLDv2 dataset.

item.title: Double-Hard Debias: Tailoring Word Embeddings for Gender Bias Mitigation
item.description: “Programmer” is more closely associated with “man” and “homemaker” is more closely associated with “woman”. Such gender bias has also been shown to propagate in downstream tasks.
